name: WhoStoleMyEggs
description:
Description:

You are a bird on the journey of finding your stolen eggs. Dodge flying arrows, branches ,stones and uncover your inner secrets...

A Godot side scrolling game made for GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022 in 10 days.

I developed my game in Godot. I used free assets for background, font and fire sprites. Other assets are made by me in GIMP thanks to the GameDev.tv 2D Game Artist course :)

Controls:

W -> Move up

S -> Move down

Space -> Fire

Credits:

  • Background https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-swamp-2d-tileset-pixel-art
  • Font https://itch.io/queue/c/733269/godot-pixel-fonts?game_id=342858
  • Fire Sprites https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-assassin-mage-viking-game-heroes-pixel-art
